info.name: Stylish: Major Management Makeover 2.0
info.description: Note: The prior version depended on Modernize Stylish Manage Page. This one is stand-alone. Makes the Manage page of Stylish much more compact and modern. More than doubles the number of styles that can fit on screen at once. Highlights styles downloaded from userstyles.org, since that seems to be important around here.
info.additionalInfo: Once installed and enabled, the layout of the list of installed styles on the Manage page will be changed dramatically. Consequently, disabling this style will cause the page layout to change so much that you will likely have to search to find this style again. Each style has 3 icons next to its name, to enable/disable, edit, and delete the style (see "Icon Legend" above). Styles from userstyles.org are highlighted in a pale green (to match the globe icon that takes you to their userstyles.org page) and have an "Update?" link beneath the buttons to check whether the style has an update.
